SEARCH
Package gw.transaction

Class AbstractBundleTransactionCallback

java.lang.Object
gw.transaction.AbstractBundleTransactionCallback
All Implemented Interfaces:
BundleTransactionCallback
Direct Known Subclasses:
ContactAutoSyncUtilBase.AutoSyncNotifierBundleTransactionCallback, ContactRetireTransactionCallback, RemoveRetireableTransactionCallback
public abstract class AbstractBundleTransactionCallback extends Object implements BundleTransactionCallback
Simple base class that provides a no-op for all interface methods. Useful if you just want to override one event.

  • Method Details

    • beforeCommit

      public void beforeCommit(Bundle bundle)
      Description copied from interface: BundleTransactionCallback
      Called before the bundle is committed to the database and before any processing on the bundle is done. This is called before any of the operations defined above
      Specified by:
      beforeCommit in interface BundleTransactionCallback
      Parameters:
      bundle - the bundle being committed

    • afterPreUpdate

      public void afterPreUpdate(Bundle bundle)
      Description copied from interface: BundleTransactionCallback
      Called after the pre update rules have fired.

      WARNING: Modifications to beans in the bundle at or after this event should be done with caution.
      The beans added, removed, more modified in the bundle will:

      • NOT call pre update rules
      Specified by:
      afterPreUpdate in interface BundleTransactionCallback
      Parameters:
      bundle - the bundle being committed

    • beforeSearchDenormObjects

      public void beforeSearchDenormObjects(Bundle bundle)
      Description copied from interface: BundleTransactionCallback
      Called after pre update and before search-related denormalizations are added to the bundle.

      WARNING: Modifications to beans in the bundle at or after this point during bundle commit should be done with caution.
      The beans added, removed, or modified in the bundle will:

      • NOT call pre update rules
      Specified by:
      beforeSearchDenormObjects in interface BundleTransactionCallback
      Parameters:
      bundle - the bundle being committed

    • afterSearchDenormObjects

      public void afterSearchDenormObjects(Bundle bundle)
      Description copied from interface: BundleTransactionCallback
      Called after 'bean callbacks' (beforeUpdate, beforeInsert, beforeRemove) are called and after search-related denormalizations have been inserted into the bundle.

      WARNING: Modifications to beans in the bundle at or after this event should be done with caution.
      The beans added, removed, more modified in the bundle will:

      • NOT call pre update rules
      • NOT call bean callbacks (beforeUpdate, beforeInsert, beforeRemove)
      • NOT change search denorm values
      Specified by:
      afterSearchDenormObjects in interface BundleTransactionCallback
      Parameters:
      bundle - the bundle being committed

    • afterValidation

      public void afterValidation(Bundle bundle)
      Description copied from interface: BundleTransactionCallback
      Called after the validation events have been called.

      WARNING: Modifications to beans in the bundle at or after this event should be done with caution.
      The beans added, removed, more modified in the bundle will:

      • NOT call pre update rules
      • NOT call bean callbacks (beforeUpdate, beforeInsert, beforeRemove)
      • NOT change search denorm values
        • *
      • NOT validation
      Specified by:
      afterValidation in interface BundleTransactionCallback
      Parameters:
      bundle - the bundle being committed

    • afterSetIds

      public void afterSetIds(Bundle bundle)
      Description copied from interface: BundleTransactionCallback
      Called after all IDs and public IDs have been set. Foreign key references are set before this event.

      WARNING: Modifications to beans in the bundle at or after this event are forbidden.

      Specified by:
      afterSetIds in interface BundleTransactionCallback
      Parameters:
      bundle - the bundle being committed

    • afterWriteToDatabase

      public void afterWriteToDatabase(Bundle bundle)
      Description copied from interface: BundleTransactionCallback
      Called after all data has been written to the database but before the transaction has been committed. The database now reflects all changes in the bundle for the connection associated with the current thread.

      WARNING: Modifications to beans in the bundle at or after this event are forbidden.

      Specified by:
      afterWriteToDatabase in interface BundleTransactionCallback
      Parameters:
      bundle - the bundle being committed

    • afterCommit

      public void afterCommit(Bundle bundle, boolean didCommit)
      Description copied from interface: BundleTransactionCallback
      Called as the last step in the commit process. By the time afterCommit is called, the list of bundle transaction callbacks is removed from the current bundle. If you need to re-add a callback to the bundle, re-add this callback : bundle.addBundleTransactionCallback(this)

      WARNING: Modifications to beans in the bundle at or after this event are forbidden.

      Specified by:
      afterCommit in interface BundleTransactionCallback
      Parameters:
      bundle - the bundle being committed
      didCommit - True if the commit succeeded, which means that data has been persisted in the DB and the global cache is coherent with the DB. Note that coherent means only that the cache will not have data in it that is incorrect with respect to the DB. An empty cache satisfies this definition.

    • beforeCommit

      @Deprecated protected final void beforeCommit()
      Deprecated.
      The signature of this callback has changed. This method has been marked final in order to force implementors to override the new method, beforeCommit(gw.pl.persistence.core.Bundle).

    • onCommitException

      @Deprecated protected final void onCommitException(Exception ex)
      Deprecated.
      This callback no longer exists. This method has been marked final in order to force implementors to override the new method, afterCommit(gw.pl.persistence.core.Bundle, boolean).
